author: Sarah Domenech
title: #DisneyFamilia: Big Kids, Big Diversión!
text:
We all know that tweens and teens can be a little hard to please when it comes to vacations that the whole familia can enjoy.
However, at Walt Disney World Resort , there’s a lot to do and see for the pre-teen and teenagers in your life, starting of course with the best thrilling attractions, including the ‘mountains challenge’!

Dare your thrill seeker to ride all of the mountains in one day starting at Magic Kingdom Park with Space Mountain , Big Thunder Mountain and Splash Mountain ! Continue to Disney’s Animal Kingdom and conquer the Yeti on Expedition Everest !

Other ‘tween-tastic’ attractions are Kali River Rapids at Disney’s Animal Kingdom, The Twilight Zone Tower of Terror and Rock ‘n Roller Coaster starring Aerosmith at Disney’s Hollywood Studios , Test Track , Soarin’ Around the World and Mission: SPACE at Epcot , and Seven Dwarfs Mine Train and the Haunted Mansion at Magic Kingdom Park.

Your big kids can also have big kid fun beyond the theme parks. At Disney Springs , they can go bowling at Splitsville Luxury Lanes or shop till they drop at Tren-D , United World of Soccer , Free People and more. They can even enjoy a delicious coke-themed mocktail at the Coca-Cola Store .
For more información on planning a trip to Walt Disney World Resort with your Tween and/or Teen, check out www.disneyworld.com/Tweens .
